approveWork(uint256).details: Requester approves the work  pays worker and mints NFT credential.

cancelJob(uint256).details: Requester cancels the job and gets the escrow back. Only possible if no one has taken the job yet (MVP rule).

createJob(uint256,uint256,string,string).details: Create a new job and lock WETH in escrow. Requester must approve this contract for the reward amount before calling.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitWork(uint256,string).details: Worker submits the delivery URL after completing the work.

takeJob(uint256).details: Worker claims the job. Anyone can take an open job (first-come, first-served).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
